# .github/agents

Agent specification files (markdown) live here in the Plan-C target structure.

Status:
- This repo currently stores runtime agent code under `agents/`.
- JSON schemas for agent I/O live under `.github/schemas/agents/`.

Next:
- Populate this folder with the 13 v1.0 agent specs (see Files/AgenticCoderPlan/AgenticCoderPlan-B.md and Plan-C Part 3).
